prompt: Request a tool to translate foreign audio to English in real-time during video playback.

hidden_queries: tool to translate foreign audio to English in real-time during video playback
software real time audio translation for video, foreign language to English
metadata.generated_search_query: tool to translate foreign audio to English in real-time during video playback

sources.title: Live Translation: Real-Time Video & Audio Translator
sources.snippet: AI-powered real-time translation tool for videos, live streams, and meetings, supporting 50+ languages.

citation_mappings.claim_text: Here are practical tools that can translate foreign audio to English in (near) real-time during video playback: Browser / Live playback Live Translation (Chrome extension): real-time video & audio translation for YouTube, live streams, meetings, etc., into English (supports 50+ languages) right in the browser. Chrome Web Store
Real-Time Video & Audio Translation (Chrome): similar AI extension that can handle live video/audio and translate into many languages. Chrome Web Store
Microsoft Edge real-time video translation: built-in feature in Edge that can translate audio to English on some videos (YouTube etc.) on hover. Microsoft
Standalone / app-like tools LiveTrans: desktop software that captures audio and provides real-time speech transcription/translation into English for live content or videos. LiveTrans
Maestra / real-time translator: online AI voice translator for live speech to text (can be paired with video playback). Maestra
TalkPersona (voice translator): listens and translates speech in real time — useful if you route video audio into it. TalkPersona

sources.title: Audio/Video Translator (Free Online & No Login)
sources.snippet: Translate your audio & video files or speech recording to any language with our free, easy-to-use online translator! No login or registration is needed.

citation_mappings.claim_text: File-based options (not truly live, but fast) AnyTranscribe (audio/video translator): upload video to get fast transcription and translation to English with subtitles. Any Transcribe
VEED.io audio-translation: AI tool to translate audio from video files and generate subtitles. VEED.IO

sources.title: These $140 earbuds translate 50+ languages while you listen
sources.snippet: The Mymanu Orb Open-Ear AI Translation Earbuds, showcased at CES 2026, offer users a unique blend of audio entertainment, real-world awareness, and advanced language translation technology. Priced at $139.99 (down from a $179.99 MSRP), these earbuds feature an open-ear design that allows users to hear their surroundings while simultaneously listening to music, taking calls, or translating real-time conversations. The standout feature is their built-in AI, which supports translation in over 50 languages across live conversations, phone calls, and spoken audio—ideal for travel, work, or multilingual environments. Beyond translation, the earbuds function as typical audio accessories with a sleek, lightweight, and water-resistant design. With up to 35 hours of battery life using the charging case and hands-free controls, they offer a user-friendly and futuristic audio solution without added complexity.

citation_mappings.claim_text: Hardware option AI translation earbuds (e.g., Mymanu Orb): translate conversations and audio in real time through the earbuds — could work for playback audio too. SFGATE

sources.title: Live Translation: Real-Time Video & Audio Translator
sources.snippet: AI-powered real-time translation tool for videos, live streams, and meetings, supporting 50+ languages.

citation_mappings.claim_text: Notes / limitations Browser extensions often work only on web players (YouTube, Twitch). Chrome Web Store
Built-in browser features (Edge) have limited language coverage currently. Microsoft
Hardware option AI translation earbuds (e.g., Mymanu Orb): translate conversations and audio in real time through the earbuds — could work for playback audio too. SFGATE
